mapper.select:
select
from resource_role_ref where RESOURCE_CODE = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=CHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into resource_role_ref (itemID, itemCode, RESOURCE_CODE, ROLE_CODE, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt) values (#{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resourceCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into resource_role_ref
itemID,
itemCode,
RESOURCE_CODE,
ROLE_CODE,
CREATER,
itemCreateAt,
UPDATER,
itemUpdateAt,
#{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update resource_role_ref
RESOURCE_CODE = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
